capability_gate_water.text: You may need to check simple water controls, valves, and indicator panels. Are you comfortable proceeding?

clarify_water_source.text: Right now, are you using city water (hose connected to campground spigot) or your fresh tank and pump?
clarify_water_source.info: Quick fact: City water is pressurized by the campground, the RV pump is usually OFF on city water. The fresh tank pump pressurizes your system only when you are not on city water. You can skip this and keep moving.

not_sure_prompt.text: Is a water hose connected to your RV and the campground spigot right now?

city_source_check.text: At the campground spigot, is the water turned ON and does it appear to have pressure?

city_spigot_test_prompt.text: If you have a small faucet at the spigot, can you confirm water comes out there?

city_hose_kink_check.text: Is your city water hose free of kinks and fully connected at both ends?

safety_city_hose_issue.text: STOP: Hose or connection issue observed. Turn off the spigot before adjusting anything. Keep electrical cords away from water.

city_inlet_check.text: At your RV city water inlet, do you see any obvious leak or spraying water when the spigot is on?

safety_city_inlet_leak.text: STOP: Leak or spraying water observed at inlet. Turn off the spigot immediately to prevent flooding.

city_symptom_scope.text: On city water, is it no water everywhere, or low water and weak flow?

city_valve_mode_check.text: Do you have a docking station or utility panel with a water mode setting (city, tank fill, normal, winterize)?

city_mode_position_check.text: Is the water mode set to NORMAL or CITY, not TANK FILL and not WINTERIZE?

city_filter_regulator_check.text: Do you have a pressure regulator at the spigot, or an inline water filter on the hose?

pump_switch_check_city.text: While on city water, is your RV water pump switch OFF?

tank_level_check.text: Does your fresh tank level show water present?

tank_air_spit_check.text: When you open a faucet, do you get air spitting or any water at all?

pump_switch_check_tank.text: Is your water pump switch ON? Some RVs have more than one pump switch.

pump_sound_check.text: When you open a faucet, do you hear the water pump running?

pump_behavior_check.text: When the faucet is closed, does the pump stop within about 10 seconds?

pump_fuse_check.text: Can you locate the water pump fuse or breaker on your 12V fuse panel?

pump_fuse_observed.text: Do you see a blown pump fuse or a tripped pump breaker?

terminal_capability_declined.summary: Pause diagnosis, minimize water usage, and schedule a technician. If you suspect a leak, turn the pump OFF and shut off the city spigot.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Declined capability gate
stabilization_actions: If leak suspected: turn pump OFF and shut off city spigot

terminal_city_spigot_off_or_no_pressure.result: City water source not providing pressure
terminal_city_spigot_off_or_no_pressure.summary: Turn off the spigot, relieve hose pressure, and avoid leaving the hose pressurized unattended.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, no spigot pressure
stabilization_actions: Do not leave hose pressurized unattended

terminal_city_spigot_uncertain.result: Cannot safely test campground spigot pressure
terminal_city_spigot_uncertain.summary: Stop diagnosis and contact campground staff to verify water service.

artifact.stop_reason: User cannot verify spigot pressure safely
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, spigot status uncertain
stabilization_actions: Contact campground staff to verify water service

terminal_city_hose_issue_observed.result: City water hose or connection issue observed
terminal_city_hose_issue_observed.summary: Turn off the spigot before adjusting anything. Keep electrical cords away from water.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, hose issue observed
stabilization_actions: Keep electrical cords away from water

terminal_city_inlet_leak_observed.result: Leak observed at city water inlet
terminal_city_inlet_leak_observed.summary: Turn off the spigot immediately to prevent flooding. Use fresh tank and pump if available.

artifact.stop_reason: Water spraying or leaking at inlet
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, leak at inlet
stabilization_actions: Use fresh tank and pump if available

terminal_water_mode_not_normal.result: Water mode setting not in normal position
terminal_water_mode_not_normal.summary: Do not force valves. If unsure, stop and capture photos for a technician.

artifact.stop_reason: Docking station or valve mode not set to NORMAL or CITY
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, water mode incorrect

terminal_city_low_flow_with_regulator_or.result: Low flow likely due to regulator, filter, or campground pressure
terminal_city_low_flow_with_regulator_or.summary: If flow is usable, conserve water and avoid running multiple fixtures at once.

artifact.stop_reason: Low flow everywhere on city water
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, low flow with regulator or filter
stabilization_actions: Avoid running multiple fixtures at once

terminal_city_low_flow_no_regulator_filt.result: Low flow on city water, no regulator or filter present
terminal_city_low_flow_no_regulator_filt.summary: Check campground pressure at spigot. If low everywhere, contact campground management.

artifact.stop_reason: Low flow without obvious external cause
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, low flow without regulator or filter

terminal_city_low_flow_unknown_regulator.result: Low flow on city water, regulator or filter status unknown
terminal_city_low_flow_unknown_regulator.summary: Schedule technician to inspect water system and identify restriction.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, low flow, restriction unknown
stabilization_actions: Schedule technician to inspect water system

terminal_city_partial_fixture_issue.result: Only some fixtures affected on city water
terminal_city_partial_fixture_issue.summary: Use working fixtures. Schedule technician to inspect affected fixture aerators or valves.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, partial fixture issue

terminal_city_pump_on_note.result: Pump switch ON while on city water
terminal_city_pump_on_note.summary: Turn pump OFF if comfortable. If you are not sure, stop and capture the current state for a technician.

artifact.stop_reason: Pump switch not OFF during city water use
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, pump switch ON
stabilization_actions: Capture current state for technician if uncertain

terminal_city_no_water_system_level.result: City water path likely has a blockage or check valve issue
terminal_city_no_water_system_level.summary: Turn off the spigot when away. Use fresh tank and pump if available.

artifact.stop_reason: City pressure present, no water at fixtures
artifact.last_confirmed_state: City water path, system-level blockage suspected
stabilization_actions: Use fresh tank and pump if available

terminal_tank_empty.summary: Turn pump OFF to avoid running it dry.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, tank empty
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF to avoid running dry

terminal_tank_low_or_air_in_lines.result: Fresh tank low or air entering the pump
terminal_tank_low_or_air_in_lines.summary: Turn pump OFF if it is rapidly cycling, and conserve remaining water.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, air in lines
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF if rapidly cycling

terminal_pump_switch_off.summary: Locate pump switch and verify position before proceeding.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, pump switch OFF
stabilization_actions: Locate pump switch and verify position

terminal_pump_switch_unknown.summary: Consult owner manual or schedule technician to locate pump controls.

artifact.stop_reason: User unsure of pump switch location
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, pump switch unknown
stabilization_actions: Schedule technician to locate pump controls

terminal_pump_fuse_not_found.result: Pump not running, fuse panel not located
terminal_pump_fuse_not_found.summary: Schedule technician to diagnose pump electrical issue.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, fuse panel not found

terminal_pump_fuse_or_breaker_issue.result: Pump fuse blown or breaker tripped
terminal_pump_fuse_or_breaker_issue.summary: Do not reset breaker or replace fuse. Schedule technician to diagnose why protection device activated.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, fuse blown or breaker tripped
stabilization_actions: Do not reset breaker or replace fuse

terminal_pump_not_running_needs_tech.summary: Schedule technician to diagnose pump electrical or mechanical failure.

artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, pump not running

terminal_pump_runs_but_no_flow.result: Pump runs but water flow not restored
terminal_pump_runs_but_no_flow.summary: Turn pump OFF when not actively testing to avoid damage or leaks.

artifact.stop_reason: Pump runs, stops normally, but water still not flowing
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, pump runs but no flow
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF when not testing

terminal_pump_runs_continuously_or_cycle.result: Pump behavior suggests leak, restriction, or pressure issue
terminal_pump_runs_continuously_or_cycle.summary: Turn pump OFF when not in use. Check for visible leaks under the RV.

artifact.stop_reason: Pump does not stop or cycles unexpectedly
artifact.last_confirmed_state: Fresh tank and pump path, pump cycling abnormally
stabilization_actions: Turn pump OFF when not in use
Check for visible leaks under RV
Schedule technician for pressure system diagnosis
